The Miami School Of Fashion & Design

This Is The Place To Be. Your Future Starts Here.

Discover Programs
Discover Our Programs

Welcome to Istituto Marangoni Miami, where we offer a range of programs tailored to the fashion and design industry. From pre-college courses to undergraduate, graduate, and vocational programs, we cater to various ages and skill levels.

Our institution emphasizes hands-on learning, mentorship from industry experts, and a commitment to pushing boundaries in the fashion world. Explore our programs and join us on your educational journey.

Associate of Applied Science in Fashion Design

An associate in fashion design explores roles of fashion in a creative sense but also in business perspectives through researching trends and influences of the fashion and luxury industries.

Associate of Applied Science in Fashion Styling

An associate in fashion styling teaches students about both the creative and business roles through rationalizing ideas, developing the ability to visualize and execute creative results.

Associate of Applied Science in Fashion Design

An associate in fashion design explores roles of fashion in a creative sense but also in business perspectives through researching trends and influences of the fashion and luxury industries.

Associate of Applied Science in Fashion Styling

An associate in fashion styling teaches students about both the creative and business roles through rationalizing ideas, developing the ability to visualize and execute creative results.

request info
Students work

Our school believes in hands-on learning and the importance of building a professional portfolio right from day one. Our students engage in extracurricular activities that go beyond classroom walls, immersing themselves in a vibrant community that extends to the heart of the fashion and design industry.

With strong industry connections, our students collaborate with luxury houses, industry experts, and participate in hands-on projects as part of their coursework. From fashion photography and videography to creative direction, fashion weeks, and design competitions, our students gain invaluable industry experience. Armed with confidence and a robust portfolio developed through classroom and real-world experiences, our graduates are well-prepared to thrive in the professional environment.

Armed with confidence and a robust portfolio developed through classroom and real-world experiences, our graduates are well-prepared to thrive in the professional environment.

All You Need to Know About a Career in Fashion Merchandising

The fashion industry overall is a dynamic and vibrant field but it’s also competitive. Dependent on creativity, research, and innovation, fashion merchandising is a vital component of the fashion and luxury environment that goes beyond everything to know about fashion. By combining ...

Your new community

New York City has no equal. A dynamic center of future-facing people, creativity, and industry, it feeds your growth as a developing artist or designer. And as a student in the center of Greenwich Village, you’re part of a diverse community with deep roots in free thinking, activism, and innovation.

I have so many friends now from all over the world; you form a tight-knit community when you're working intensely on group design projects with people of different backgrounds and perspectives. These are friends for life.

Regina, Student, BFA Integrated Design
Connecting Excellence, Diversity, and Success
95% of placement rate for the graduating class of 2022.
170 collaborations with luxury brands in the design district for our students.
60% cur student body is international.

Get In Touch
The Miami School of Fashion & Design

Istituto Marangoni Miami’s vision is to always be at the center of style, to drive students’ ambitions and dreams through creativity and innovation, to support creative industries worldwide, and to provide a solid and cross-disciplinary approach to education, research and business solutions in the world of Fashion and Design.

Name of Program
A collection for lovers of Domino style

IMM Fashion Design students had the opportunity to participate in a contest with Salvatore Ferragamo. The brand donated 500 ties that remained unsold during the challenging times of the pandemic. Our talented students embarked on a journey of innovation, repurposing the ties to craft stunning creations, from elegant dresses to trendy bucket hats and even fashionable umbrellas. The winner of the challenge had the opportunity to have their design showcased in the Salvatore Ferragamo Bal Harbour store.
